messages.message: anyone know what sbberic/instabase is and why i'm getting travis CI alerts about failed builds in that repo?
Sometimes Travis will get weird and send you alerts about failed builds on a shared repo but from another user’s account, so that is probably a build from Eric

That's actually a GitHub problem I think - - you're automatically watching new forks of instabase/instabase so you get their notifications (like Travis). Don't automatically follow new forks abd unfollow the ones you are following
I'm not watching his repo. I think it's because he ran a travis CI build on my PR on his repo. I didn't even know we could do that
i think that might happen if instead of creating a new commit with his changes, he amended the previous one which happened to be yours.
Sorry about this I'm not sure what I did. Should I have Travis builds turned off on my forked repo? (completely new to how Travis CI works)
probably because when you create a PR they will run on instabase/instabase

you don’t need to have it turned on for your forked repo @Eric Han. it won’t work after 100 runs anyways (since that’s how long the trial lasts). our subscription only covers the repos in the `instabase/*` org.
